import React from 'react' import Header from '../../Partials/Driver/Header' import axios from 'axios' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" export default class UpdateOffer extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ id:new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get('id'), offer: {}, is_updated: false } } componentDidMount = async ()=>{ this.fetchOffer() } fetchOffer = async () => { const res= await axios({ method: "GET", url: "http://127.0.0.1:8080/EJB-Client/APIv1.0/annonces/"+this.state.id, headers: { "Content-Type": "Application/json"}, }) if(res.status===200){ this.setState({ offer: res.data }) } } handleUpdate = async () => { const res= await axios({ method: "PUT", url: "http://127.0.0.1:8080/EJB-Client/APIv1.0/annonces?mili=", data: {}, headers: { "Content-Type": "Application/json"}, }) if(res.status===200){ this.setState({ is_deleted: true }) } } render(){ return (
